hints.content:
The denominator in $\dfrac{5}{2}$, is $2$. 

So, there should be $2$ equal parts in each whole.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 3 with tick marks every one-half unit. The tick marks for 1 and 2 are labeled. Six equal rectangles labeled one-half are above the number line. Each rectangle represents one-half of a whole. The third and fourth rectangles from the left are shifted upward. !

hints.content:
The numerator in $\dfrac{5}{2}$, is $5$. 

So, there should be $5$ equal parts shaded.



[[☃ image 1]]



Which number line shows a point located at $\dfrac{5}{2}$?

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 3 with tick marks every one-half unit. The tick marks for one-half, 1, and 2 are labeled. Six equal rectangles labeled one-half are above the number line. Each rectangle represents one-half of a whole. The third and fourth rectangles from the left are shifted upward. The first five rectangles from the left are shaded. An arrow points right along the number line from the tick mark 0 to the first tick mark after the 2. !

hints.content: Number line $\maroonD{B}$ shows a point located is at $\dfrac{5}{2}.$

question.content:
**Which point is at $\dfrac{5}{​2}$ on the number line?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: $\greenD{A}$ ![A number line that has moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled 1, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled 2, an unlabeled tick mark and an ending tick mark at 3. A green dot appears at the 2 tick mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e03cc9e2712d1288508fe4fca3a1e438bf895432)

$\maroonD{B}$ ![A number line that has moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled 1, an unlabeled tick mark, a tick mark labeled 2, an unlabeled tick mark, and an ending tick mark at 3. A pink dot appears at the first tick mark after 2.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/173af16cdc1bec1a2709b2453351cc3d7bdb983e)

$\blueD{C}$ ![A number line that has moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, four unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, four unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 2, four unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 3. A blue dot appears at the second tick mark after 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3e24262f75eb7089d64bac823a15aa35272e1ca4)
